id.description: The id of the trigger element. Set automatically if not provided

highlightedOptionId.description: The id of the option in the list that should be considered highlighted

selectedOptionId.description: The id of the option(s) in the list that should be considered selected

isShowingOptions.description: Whether or not the options should be visible

onRequestShowOptions.description: Callback fired when the options want to become visible

onRequestHideOptions.description: Callback fired when the options no longer want to be visible

onRequestHighlightOption.description:
Callback fired when option is hovered or highlighted via keyboard.
Either the `id` or the `direction` parameter is supplied

tsType.name: signature

onRequestHighlightFirstOption.description: Callback fired when first option should be highlighted

onRequestHighlightLastOption.description: Callback fired when last option should be highlighted

onRequestSelectOption.description: Callback fired when option clicked or selected via keyboard
